title: Project-Based Curriculum Integrating Learner Growth Process and Flow Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Core Social Science Theories and Professional (Medical/Legal/Technical) Practical Experience
context.additional_context: Advanced learners solve real-world social problems through project-based tasks, utilizing personal devices to create flexible learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can maintain a state of flow (Flow State) for over 85% of the time during the project execution process
Learners can complete a project aimed at solving social issues and submit portfolio-based evidence of growth grounded in professional expertise
Learners can revise and improve project goals at least three times based on peer and instructor feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
